briefdescription.para: The class Advancing_front_surface_reconstruction_vertex_base_3 is the default vertex type for the class Advancing_front_surface_reconstruction.

parameterdescription.para: has to be a model of DelaunayTriangulationTraits_3.
has to be a model of TriangulationVertexBase_3.
